entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming west 20 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
